short_description: Advanced multimodal audio language model with state-of-the-art performance on speech recognition, understanding, and generation tasks.

provenance.notes: Step-Audio 2 is a large audio language model demonstrating strong performance across English and Chinese ASR, audio understanding, speech translation, and dialogue tasks. Published in Step-Audio 2 Technical Report.

architecture_details: Large audio language model with end-to-end audio processing capabilities. Supports real-time audio understanding, speech recognition, translation, and generation.

size_params.activated_params_note: Exact parameter count not publicly disclosed. Designed for efficient audio processing with competitive performance.

capabilities.asr_english: State-of-the-art English ASR with ~2.5% WER on LibriSpeech test-clean
capabilities.audio_understanding: Advanced audio understanding on MMAU and other benchmarks
capabilities.dialogue: Real-time audio dialogue with URO-Bench scores of 84.54 (EN) and 74.18 (ZH)

hardware_recommendations.notes: Efficient audio model suitable for single GPU deployment. Optimized for real-time audio processing.

inference.notes: Designed for efficient audio processing with competitive latency. Supports real-time dialogue and streaming audio tasks.

notes: Step-Audio 2 demonstrates strong performance across multiple audio tasks including English and Chinese ASR, audio understanding, speech translation, and real-time dialogue. The model achieves competitive or state-of-the-art results on benchmarks like LibriSpeech, URO-Bench, and MMAU.
